name: bbyen
description: Bbyen is a self-hosted modern budgeting and expense tracking tool built to help individuals stay on top of their finances with categorized expenses, budgeting goals, reports, and easy-to-understand summaries.
features: Budget Tracking: Modern expense tracking and budgeting tool. Financial clarity.
Expense Categories: Organize spending into customizable categories. Smart organization.
Budget Goals: Set and track financial goals. Stay on target.
Financial Reports: View spending summaries and trends. Understand your money.
Easy Summaries: Clear, understandable financial overviews. No confusion.
Self-Hosted: Keep financial data completely private. Maximum privacy.
Individual Focus: Designed for personal finance management. Perfect for individuals.
Simple Interface: Clean UI makes budgeting easy. No complexity.
